mapper.sql: SELECT O.ORD_NO # 주문번호 , OD.ORD_DTL_NO , O.ORD_DTTM # 주문일시 , PROD.REP_IMG # 이미지 , OD.ORD_STUS # 주문상태코드 , GET_CD_NM('O0001', OD.ORD_STUS) AS ORD_STUS_NM # 주문상태 , OD.PROD_ID , OD.PROD_NM # 상품명 , (GET_DC_PRC(OD.PROD_PRC, OD.PROD_DC_PER) + IFNULL(PO.OPT_PRC, 0)) * OD.QTY AS PROD_AMT # 상품금액(할인가격 + 옵션가) * 주문수량 , (SELECT IFNULL(GROUP_CONCAT(CONCAT(OG.OPT_GRP_NM, ' : ', OI.OPT_ITEM_NM) SEPARATOR ', '), '') FROM OPT_GRP OG JOIN OPT_ITEM OI ON OG.OPT_GRP_ID = OI.OPT_GRP_ID JOIN PROD_OPT_COMB POC ON POC.OPT_ITEM_ID = OI.OPT_ITEM_ID WHERE OPT_COMB_NO = OD.OPT_COMB_NO) AS OPT_NM # 옵션 , OD.QTY # 수량 , P.PAY_TP # 결제방법 , P.REAL_PAY_AMT # 결제금액 FROM ORD O JOIN ORD_DTL OD ON O.ORD_NO = OD.ORD_NO JOIN PAY P ON OD.ORD_NO = P.ORD_NO JOIN PRODUCT PROD ON OD.PROD_ID = PROD.PROD_ID LEFT JOIN PROD_OPT PO ON OD.OPT_COMB_NO = PO.OPT_COMB_NO
mapper.select: WHERE O.ORDR_ID = #{mbrId} AND P.PAY_STUS NOT IN (20, 30) AND STR_TO_DATE(ORD_DTTM, '%Y-%m-%d') BETWEEN STR_TO_DATE(#{startDate}, '%Y-%m-%d') AND STR_TO_DATE(#{endDate}, '%Y-%m-%d') ORDER BY O.ORD_NO DESC, OD.ORD_DTL_NO

SELECT P.ORD_AMT # 주문금액 , P.DLV_FEE # 배송비 , GET_CPN_DC_AMT(ORD_AMT, CPN_ISS_NO) AS CPN_DC_AMT # 쿠폰할인 , P.PNT_USE_AMT # 포인트 사용 , P.REAL_PAY_AMT # 총 결제금액(실결제금액) , P.PAY_TP # 결제방법 , GET_CD_NM('O0010', P.PAY_TP) AS PAY_TP_NM # 결제방법이름 , P.REG_DTTM AS APRV_DTTM # 승일일시(결제일시) FROM PAY P WHERE P.PAYER_ID = #{mbrId} AND ORD_NO = #{ordNo} AND PAY_STUS NOT IN (20, 30)
SELECT ORD_STUS, COUNT(*) AS ORD_STUS_CNT FROM ORD_DTL OD GROUP BY OD.ORD_STUS

SELECT O.ORD_NO , OD.ORD_DTL_NO , OD.PROD_NM , GET_CD_NM('O0001', OD.ORD_STUS) AS ORD_STUS_NM # 주문상태 , OD.ORD_STUS , M.NAME AS ORDR_NM # 구매자명 , M.LGIN_ID # 구매자 ID , (SELECT IFNULL(GROUP_CONCAT(CONCAT(OG.OPT_GRP_NM, ' : ', OI.OPT_ITEM_NM) SEPARATOR ', '), '') FROM OPT_GRP OG JOIN OPT_ITEM OI ON OG.OPT_GRP_ID = OI.OPT_GRP_ID JOIN PROD_OPT_COMB POC ON POC.OPT_ITEM_ID = OI.OPT_ITEM_ID WHERE OPT_COMB_NO = OD.OPT_COMB_NO) AS OPT_NM # 옵션 , OD.QTY # 수량 , (GET_DC_PRC(OD.PROD_PRC, OD.PROD_DC_PER) + IFNULL(PO.OPT_PRC, 0)) * OD.QTY AS PROD_AMT # 상품금액(할인가격 + 옵션가) * 주문수량 , GET_CD_NM('O0002', OC.CLAIM_STUS) AS CLAIM_STUS_NM # 클레임 상태명 , OC.CLAIM_STUS FROM ORD O JOIN ORD_DTL OD ON O.ORD_NO = OD.ORD_NO JOIN MEMBER M ON O.ORDR_ID = M.MBR_ID LEFT JOIN PROD_OPT PO ON OD.OPT_COMB_NO = PO.OPT_COMB_NO LEFT JOIN ORD_CLAIM OC ON OD.ORD_DTL_NO = OC.ORD_DTL_NO WHERE OD.ORD_DTL_NO = #{ordDtlNo};

SELECT PROD_NM, TOT_PROD_AMT FROM (SELECT PROD_NM, PROD_ID, SUM(PROD_AMT) AS TOT_PROD_AMT FROM (SELECT PROD.PROD_ID , PROD.PROD_NM , (GET_DC_PRC(OD.PROD_PRC, OD.PROD_DC_PER) + IFNULL(PO.OPT_PRC, 0)) * OD.QTY AS PROD_AMT # 상품금액(할인가격 + 옵션가) * 주문수량 FROM ORD O JOIN ORD_DTL OD ON O.ORD_NO = OD.ORD_NO JOIN PAY P ON OD.ORD_NO = P.ORD_NO JOIN PRODUCT PROD ON OD.PROD_ID = PROD.PROD_ID LEFT JOIN PROD_OPT PO ON OD.OPT_COMB_NO = PO.OPT_COMB_NO AND P.PAY_STUS NOT IN (20, 30)) A GROUP BY PROD_ID, PROD_NM) B ORDER BY TOT_PROD_AMT DESC LIMIT 5
